Former Redwood High student files lawsuit alleging school covered up teacher abuse

Jane Doe, now 38, alleges that her former teacher at the Marin County school raped her multiple times during her junior and senior years. In her lawsuit, she alleges the teacher pasted magazine pages on her windows to hide the abuse from passersby.
